title: The School is not an island
creator_credit: Chris Noonan, Malcolm Otton, Timothy Read and Film Australia
brief_description: A group of students from Sunshine North Technical School in Melbourne, Victoria, attempt to start their own coffee shop as part of a community involvement program, and discover much about their ability to control their lives.
creator_credit_for_label: Chris Noonan, Malcolm Otton, Timothy Read and Film Australia
description: A group of students from Sunshine North Technical School in Melbourne, Victoria, attempt to start their own coffee shop as part of a community involvement program, and discover much about their ability to control their lives.
